articles.title: Inspired by Canadian truck protests, 'People's Convoy' heads to Washington - Reuters
articles.description: A group of American truckers began a cross-country drive from California to Washington on Wednesday to protest coronavirus restrictions, taking a cue from demonstrations that paralyzed Canada's capital city, Ottawa, for weeks.
articles.content: ADELANTO, Calif., Feb 23 (Reuters) - A group of American truckers began a cross-country drive from California to Washington on Wednesday to protest coronavirus restrictions, taking a cue from demonst… [+3950 chars]

articles.content:
HOUSTON Shots were fired inside a southwest Houston shopping mall Wednesday, according to Houston police.

articles.title: Docs discuss case of 3rd person cured of HIV after stem cell transplant - Bay Area Reporter, America's highest circulation LGBT newspaper
articles.description: A woman in New York City who has no detectable HIV after undergoing a new type of stem cell transplant may represent another rare cure, researchers reported February 15 at the annual Conference on Retroviruses and Opportunistic Infections.

articles.description: According to the ICPC, some of the assets are located in the United States of America, Abuja and Kaduna
articles.content:
The Federal High Court in Abuja, on Wednesday, ordered the interim forfeiture of assets and monies allegedly traced to the immediate past governor of Zamfara State, Abdulaziz Yari.
